entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Twillingate
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain mixed with snow beginning this afternoon. Fog patches developing near noon. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm except 2 cm along parts of the coast. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Windy. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
